attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned apetition the Prime minister to put a stop to the steady erosion of civil liberties by the government over recent years and to put a stop to the steady rise in human rights abuses in every situation in which it has any influence -for example flights of rendition, through positive government action
